_owen.COMINFO: ⚡️ 𝐏𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐟𝐲 𝐰𝐡𝐢𝐜𝐡 𝐋𝐚𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐱 𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐰𝐨𝐮𝐥𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐤𝐞 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐩 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 ! 𝐔𝐬𝐚𝐠𝐞: .𝐥𝐚𝐯𝐚𝐧 <𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐞 𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐞>
_owen.DESC: Lists all my commands or information about a specific command.

_plugin.NOT_FOUND_PLUGIN: 𝑀𝑎𝑦𝑏𝑒 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑖𝑛𝑠𝑡𝑎𝑙𝑙𝑒𝑑 𝑠𝑢𝑐ℎ 𝑎 𝑝𝑙𝑢𝑔𝑖𝑛, 𝑚𝑎𝑦𝑏𝑒 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑑𝑖𝑑𝑛'𝑡. 𝐵𝑢𝑡 𝑖𝑡 𝑐𝑒𝑟𝑡𝑎𝑖𝑛𝑙𝑦 𝑖𝑠𝑛'𝑡 𝑟𝑖𝑔ℎ𝑡 𝑛𝑜𝑤.

admin.BAN_DESC: Bans people from the group. Tag the person next to the command.
admin.IM_NOT_ADMIN: 𝐼'𝑚 𝑛𝑜𝑡 𝑎𝑛 𝑎𝑑𝑚𝑖𝑛 𝑖𝑛 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑔𝑟𝑜𝑢𝑝!

vector.VECTOR_DESC: Activates fully functional Vector features. Turn your account into a chatbot!

spotify.SPOTIFY_DESC: View the music you listen to on spotify instantly in your Instagram bio.
spotify.ALREADY_ON: Spotify auto bio is already on!
spotify.ALREADY_OFF: Spotify auto bio is already turned off!
